website_summaries.verdict: The HP Slate 21 is a promise that Android will work for desktop PC users as well as it does for tablet users, with a nice price. The system fails on both counts.
pros: Don't have to worry about Windows malware
Wide viewing angles and bright screen
cons: 8GB is too little local storage space
Browser is optimized for mobile sites

customer_reviews.title: If you want an easy computer to learn to use
customer_reviews.text: If you want an easy computer to learn to use. Or you want your computer to work like your phone, so you don't have to deal with two systems constantly, this is the computer Apple should have made 30 years ago when they were Saying that the Mac was "intuitive". Of course, if you have never used a smartphone before, or Android, then sure, there will be a learning curve, just a mercifully shorter one. It's too bad that the concept of the Desktop phone-Companion seems to have died. Because this is a sweet little machine, and I know a lot of especially older people that would take to this like butter on toast.
customer_reviews.author: tup

customer_reviews.title: Really Want This to Work!
customer_reviews.text: I hate Window 8 and really want this to be a suitable replacement, and I believe it will be, however, there are still limitations to what you can do with the Android based software. It works really well for day to day tasks, lightning fast browsing, boots quickly, does not freeze, and the interface is very intuitive...come on Windows! It is a nice looking unit, great display, touchscreen is very nice, keyboard and mouse work as they should. Our needs require advanced word processing capability and that is where the software offering are still a bit limited, otherwise very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dozer

customer_reviews.title: All-in-one
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Easy setup and I love that it runs on android! I purchased this for school and the touchscreen is just amazing high quality picture and screen size is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Nice Device for Content Consumption
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my elderly parents to keep in the kitchen to browse email, look at photos, watch videos and surf the net. They love it. Its simple to use and has a large display which is great for older people. Unless you need to do a lot of typing, you can simply use this as a large tablet. App updates occur in the background automatically, so its really a low-maintenance machine.
customer_reviews.author: Explorer

customer_reviews.title: 12.5" usable area?
customer_reviews.text: This used to be the perfect combination for reading magazines from Next Issue(Texture). By pairing it with a stand that rotates 90 degrees I was able to use the entire 21 inch display. Now that they have "fixed" that, it will only use about 12.5" because it is forced into landscape. Horrible step in the wrong direction. There is no option to set the display to portrait orientation. I fully expect that there would be no gravity sensor or accelerometer but at least give me the option to select portrait as a preference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HP has done a great job.  Low cost, high utilization.
customer_reviews.text: HP has done a great job. Low cost, high utilization. If you can live with Android and cloud based apps which is very realistic today. Great resolution and picture. Quality build. VESA mountable for flexibility. Will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Spineman

customer_reviews.title: We like it
customer_reviews.text: It is huge, really huge. I was hoping to buy something that would work for sheet music, side by side, on a piano, this really does not work for that because it is too big, but we decided to keep it because it is actually a really fast computer and the kids love that it is a touchscreen and functions like a tablet. I don't know how much real work one could do on this, but for email, internet and apps, it is pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Nice big screen mouse kybd
customer_reviews.text: but after limping along for 5 years, it won't even boot. It just shows the HP powering up screen indefinitely when powered. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Just received my slate21 and im really disappointed. The touchscreen is not working
customer_reviews.text: Just received my slate21 and im really disappointed. The touchscreen is not working. And I was suppose to receive a new product. But when I opened the Gmail I saw that my computer was already used. And I have a lot of emails en contacts from another person.
customer_reviews.author: Janine anbinder

customer_reviews.title: a few issues but not a deal breaker
customer_reviews.text: Puchased this in october 15. Loved the android system. Its like a huge cell phone. However, it is now running slow, it loads slow, and the word app keeps shutting down unexpectedly! Not good since im a student. Ive had to rewrite a lot of papers. Also, some apps are not compatible with an android system. Like website builders. Other than those issues no complaints. I move it from room to room with ease. Even during bath time. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Seanta Kelly

customer_reviews.title: love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tablet, well i dont know if i could call this a tablet due to its size, but a great product none the less. It has a fast response time to touch and launching programs, and thanks to the new firmware update its even better with the dual window option. It helps to take full advantage of this tablets shear size and processing capabilities. I tip my hat to you HP, you've done it again.
customer_reviews.author: Roman P.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Biggest touchscreen out there. Works great and love the design. Using primarily as a central note and calendar station for the family. Like that it isAndroid based and can use all my phone apps. Wish Apple would break down and create a large touchscreen, but will settle for a nice inexpensive Android option in the mean time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm not great with technology, but this is surprisingly easy to use. Do not forget that this is a TABLET. This means that it is used as a MOBILE device. This is not considered a desktop and will not work for certain software.
customer_reviews.author: Reema Kobrosly

customer_reviews.title: Great giant android pad
customer_reviews.text: Great giant android tablet. I used to replace my DOA iMac to monitor video surveillance feeds and some other low intensity tasks. It does the job perfectly and was easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: P. KAT

customer_reviews.title: More like tablet than a computer!
customer_reviews.text: Didnt like it run on Android system which is why price is cheaper than Hp Pavilion. Its great if your wanting a tablet but for a computer no dont buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sadieso

customer_reviews.title: Colors pop. Sound amazing.
customer_reviews.text: This product is simply a great way to enjoy the android experience at home when your preference turns to iOS on the road. The screen's beautiful and the speakers are outstanding. Slingbox/xfinity/uverse apps make it THE best kitchen TV one doesn't yet own. 4 stars stem from a lack of hdmi input and not knowing if the device will ever get a kitkat upgrade. If you're an iPhone/iPad agnostic, but have an itch to play with android this is your beast.
customer_reviews.author: M Troy

customer_reviews.title: Can't praise it enough!
customer_reviews.text: I love this PC. It is like using an IPAD yet it is 21". You can use memory card to expand the memory. It does what I need to do but may not be satisfactory for the more saavy computer tech user. It was bought at a very reasonable cost.
customer_reviews.author: POO

customer_reviews.title: Not a all-in-one computer
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a all-in-one computer, it is a large tablet. Has great graphics and works really fast. Not loaded with Mircosoft stuff either. Works for me and the wife to use surfing the web and checking e-mail.
customer_reviews.author: James Raby

customer_reviews.title: best thing i ever bought
customer_reviews.text: best thing i ever bought, was looking for a new laptop, i keep this in my dining room and use it everytime i pass it, would be great for kitchens...i wish there were more stars to give this product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen mac manus

customer_reviews.title: Slate
customer_reviews.text: Very fond of it but not for everybody. Crashes too much - 30 sec reset. Won't load anything with Flash but I love putting it in my lap with a pillow. Excellent picture, understand that it's being discontinued
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Barely one.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of trouble keeping this Slate from freezing up. The new 17.3 is great thought but neither has card slots or other extras of real computers. These are essentially tablets not all in one desktops.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Good as shown here
customer_reviews.text: Work perfect but doesnt support and CD drive. More room for improvemnt hp

customer_reviews.title: NOT A COMPUTER- BIG TABLET
customer_reviews.text: Not a computer, this is a giant tablet. The browser kept closing out for no reason, working on something and Blip gone. I would not buy this again.

customer_reviews.title: All the User Friendly ness of a tablet, all ...
customer_reviews.text: All the User Friendly ness of a tablet, all the function of a desktop. Only problem seems to be that it doesn't recognize my printer. Have to buy a new printer or run a windows system for the printer. Software seams much more stable then windows every was. Want to comment very negatively

customer_reviews.title: I love this computer the pictures are so bright
customer_reviews.text: I love this computer the pictures are so bright. I don, t even use my key board I just use mouse an the on line keyboard. It was so easy for me because its just like a table. And I have a few so its just like getting on a 21 inch table. I am very pleased with my purchase an its also used.

customer_reviews.text: i loved this little all in one it did everything i wanted i sat it up in my kitchen as a little tv and go too cookbook!

customer_reviews.text: Price was good but hadn't noticed it was an older version of Android. Still works well for most purposes but some apps will not run on it.

customer_reviews.title: ... with our Canon printer are too many and too great.
customer_reviews.text: Actually this unit deserves higher rating but the problems we have getting it to connect and print with our Canon printer are too many and too great.
customer_reviews.author: carol  wilson

customer_reviews.title: HP Slate 21-k100 21.5-Inch All-in-One Touchscreen Desktop
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. Purchased for my 70 year old mother. She loves it. Easy to use even if you don't use an Android product.

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this hp runs great and better then I was thinking of them very happy. Now my buissness can run smoother ty

customer_reviews.title: perfect

customer_reviews.title: Best buy I've made lately
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this is an Android tablet. (Think Monster IPad ) If you're looking for a PC, this isn't it. It is the greatest Teacher/BabySitter ever for my 4 year old granddaughter, and with wifi access to Google's Play Store, most of Grandpa's time is spent finding new educational games She now has about 70, mostly free. It's a great machine and if you buy the 2014 version it has a larger memory, too. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Mohr

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! I love the big screen without the hassle ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! I love the big screen without the hassle of a desktop huge tablet!!! My daughter wants one now!!! So hard to get up from it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Clayton

customer_reviews.title: This HP Slate 21-k100 is very sleek, nice white color, big monitor, graphics excellent, keyboard very light to touch.GB8!
customer_reviews.text: The all in one is really nice as a touchscreen or scrolling with the mouse. Has awesome built in camera, edit your pictures, post them or use the video option. Still playing with mine, checking out all the apps. I would recommend this computer to anyone, all I need now is a printer.
customer_reviews.author: C.Francis

customer_reviews.title: this is an unusual computer if you can call it ...
customer_reviews.text: this is an unusual computer if you can call it that. very impressive until you need to use it for work. basically its a huge tablet. difficult to print not compatible with windows.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, very happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: Great value, beautiful display. This is a great web browsing machine, and if your life is Google/Android centric, good for more complex tasks as well. If you are familiar with Android, this is very intuitive to use. We use it primarily as a kitchen computer for browsing and kids schoolwork, and it's sleek profile is very unobtrusive.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a gift they love it, use it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: returned it, kept crashing
customer_reviews.text: i got this with the intent of leaving it by the kitchen\dining area for family\friends to use. however, when i plugged it in and set it all up, whenever i went into the settings app, it would crash. it would load half way, freeze for about a minute, then pop up and say it wasn't responding and send me back to the main screen. i tried a few things, then gave up, and returned it. it recognized my hp wireless keyboard, but not my logitech mouse. not sure it that can be adjusted in the settings or not, or if it only works with hp peripherals.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: excellent product just what i needed it has all the ...
customer_reviews.text: excellent product just what i needed it has all the features i wanted and then some

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: But it is a TABLET! You need an e-printer. but wonderful screen for games, surfing online and skype. The only reason for giving only 4 stars: No instruction booklet and even on HP's website, instructions are minimal. Love that it comes with a keyboard and again, Amazon had the best price by far!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome swvice
customer_reviews.text: Awesome kitchen computer. Hung it on the wall. Use it as a message center, argument stopper, entertainment device. Highly recommend it

customer_reviews.title: Nothing else like it

I'm not a tech expert so I'm not going to detail the specs, but my whole family now flocks to this device. It's an amazing product. I wish HP can market this more to the mainstream crowd.

customer_reviews.title: Freezes
customer_reviews.text: The device freezes. It usually happens at the beginning of a session. But it is fast and it meets my simple needs. I would not advise it for a student or for business purposes however.

customer_reviews.title: would not power on ...
customer_reviews.text: Would give 0 stars if allowed. Received timely but it did not work ...would not even power on. Called HP support and they were no help ... Called amazon and was given refund no option to receive working product.

customer_reviews.title: Better than i thought it would be!!
customer_reviews.text: fast, very nice screen, easy to use and upgrade, touch screen is very responsive, cam is very good and the price is right!!

customer_reviews.title: It is alright but
customer_reviews.text: Nice screen size and responsive touchscreen but it lacks HDMI, and there is no battery. I was kind of more upset that it does not have a battery.

customer_reviews.title: Get it before it is gone
customer_reviews.text: Machine works better then ever expected... beats my android tablet, my iPad, and my android phone..... good value everything works as stated and even better.... Love it....

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: great price, good value for an all in one,happy with all my H P products,does everything it should,my grand kids love it

customer_reviews.title: i love it, its perfect in size and its android ...
customer_reviews.text: i love it, its perfect in size and its android my only problem is the screen keep freezing up and i have to unplug ang plug up again and it keeps dropping wifi

customer_reviews.title: I happen to like it. It's like having a big ipad
customer_reviews.text: I happen to like it. It's like having a big ipad. For me it's perfect for quickly surfing on the web, answering emails and I love the size!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey B.

customer_reviews.title: HP Slate 21 - k100
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this Slate for a month now. I am very happy and would tell my friends to buy one also. I am not going to go in details but awesome by all accounts. Andriod is a different animal, my 1st venture with and like it. I also like windows and my first computer was an Apple back in the day. LOL Just a tad 2 big and heavy for a tablet. I am going to build a table and inlay this Slate. Will share pics. For 350 bucks you cannot go wrong!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Van Kirk

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: hook up was easy all paper work included came with charger cable. all warranty info was easy to read and understand.
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: hp slate
customer_reviews.text: large hd screen with very sharp picture. still learning android system but very similar to my smartphone. overall a nice compact system without a noisy fan from a tower.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected at first, but after using it I really enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Mayfield

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: My father purchased this notebook, it is perfect for his needs. Delivered promptly, on time works great. love that it is an android.
customer_reviews.author: gregory webb

customer_reviews.title: Make it work
customer_reviews.text: It was worth the money. Glad I bought it. I love it. It would be nice if I didn't have to keep it plugged up. If only I could just push the power button without the plug. I still give it 5stars
customer_reviews.author: dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty neat
customer_reviews.text: The computer turned out alot bigger than i expected, but i love it. I do love the touch screen and the audio. However I did not look for this because i thought every big computer would have a cd rom. This does not have a cd rom. Also another issue i have is that it does not support adobe flash player, which is needed for quite a few sites if you want to play games or watch videos.I do love that it is android base. Honestly I love this computer but, to make it better a cd rom should be added and support adobe flash player.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Good product, just like my 10 inch tablet
customer_reviews.text: wasn't what i expected. Good product, just like my 10 inch tablet. The seller described it as a desktop computer
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Davis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome computer
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this all in one desktop! Its just like my phone so I didnt have to try to learn how to use it. Its got amazing picture and sound. I would highly recommend this for anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Buddin

customer_reviews.title: It's Great!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the computer with some reservations taking into consideration the presence of good and bad comments. I'm not a picky person so it's great for my needs. It did take a while getting accustomed to the Android rather than the Windows software. I'm really happy with the product and my little sister has a field day exploring the apps. Hope you also enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: clement

customer_reviews.title: Can't Do Better for the Price
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I use all three of the top OS's, and we have a strong preference for Android. We thought, "Wouldn't it be nice if someone made an Android desktop?" Bingo! This is it. I'm not going to suggest that this a screamin' machine or anything, but bang for the buck here is unmatched, and dudes, we have a serious amount of tech. Way to go HP! Now double down on this thing, and you'll be back to where you were before that 7" Slate:-)
customer_reviews.author: Richard Spafford

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: used for a couple of months and it functions well. I used it basically for youtube and occasional web browse. The only problem is the power button that sometimes you have to plug out power and restart , pressing the power button does not display the screen.
customer_reviews.author: flowtown

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: It was ok... Like a big phone hard to add a printer with out a second compter great for the kids
customer_reviews.author: mrs.tootle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my office!
customer_reviews.text: I know exactly what I was getting; I just needed a nice screen on which I could use my work software from a cloud server through a browser. And for that this is a great option and I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Chalasani

customer_reviews.title: Fast, Beautiful, Well Built and Inexpensive!
customer_reviews.text: I love this computer. Finally an alternative to Windows and Mac!! This is the best deal I have ever seen. I love this machine.
customer_reviews.author: NOTMADEINCHINA

customer_reviews.title: Not Much of Anything to Celebrate
customer_reviews.text: It was nothing like I expected from reading the info and all the reviews. Android is not ready to do PCs yet, especially desktops. It doesn't work well for on or offline handling of business. I took a chance after reading the PC magazines' reviews and its about as horrible as they said. I ditched an LG and sold it to purchase this and it didn't do much better except for having an SD card slot. I honestly wish I could return it. Android-based computers have gone all the way back to the archaic days when all we had were green screens and had to hard-code things by hand. It's a bull in a china shop.
customer_reviews.author: Reneegede

customer_reviews.title: Very nice computer
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice touch screen computer that I bought for a client. Everything is built in and he likes the fact that he can set it up anywhere he likes without all of the extra hassles of numerous cables etc... The screen is huge and since he wears glasses it suits him well... shipping was very fast as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia M

customer_reviews.title: Could be 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: It's great, but WHY didn't it come with Windows Office? Though it's nothing major, it's just one more thing to do to make it user ready.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Idea......
customer_reviews.text: Only thing is they show it with the keyboard and it doesn't come with it. But nice speed and nice color

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for kids!! My 2 and 3 year old love it!

customer_reviews.text: This is basically a 21.5 inch tablet. To have many of favorite android apps and games on such a large screen is just fantastic. I have coupled this with a Brother Office Smart printer which has turned the slate into a full fledged office machine capable of great versatility even compared to traditional computing.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J.

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This is not a PC as proclaimed by HP. This is a glorified tablet...can't even use adobe flash player...it's also extremely slow functioning. I would not recommend this product unless you want a really nice screen with the function of a tablet. 2 stars only for the screen only
customer_reviews.author: Danny Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I like this product so much. I absolutely recommend this product. I can do everything I need. It is fast and very responsive

customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 70 year old dad who's dinosaur of a computer had to go. He loves it and now I want one

customer_reviews.text: This is definitely not what I thought I ordered. Appearance very deceiving as this is an ect rely large tablet. When first installed, I've had nothing but trouble. Viruses scams etc. it does have beautiful screen and color, would be good for video games but not long term actions.

customer_reviews.text: very very simple to use...like having a gigantic kindle. My kids (9 & 11) love this! Has capabilities I havent used yet like wireless printing. We have owned this for 3 months now.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful touch screen. Fast performance. Video chat. Nice keyboard and mouse. Millions of applications, movies and songs via Google Play Store. Boxed up the old windows computer. Absolutely love it.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice...love the product. But can't figure out how to use the symbols on the keyboard

customer_reviews.text: but not a desktop. Periodically problems with freezing the device completely (couldn't identify the issue) and self-closing apps from time to time (lack of memory?). Everything else is pretty decent. I wish I could use it, but I cannot.

customer_reviews.title: ok

customer_reviews.title: Returned it within the hour
customer_reviews.text: Brand new out of the box and froze twice within an hour. I hadn't even registered anything yet. Not sure what the issue was but I returned it within an hour of opening it. Amazon customer service was amazing of course.

customer_reviews.author: William McNamara

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't work for my needs
customer_reviews.text: It was advertised as a computer when all I could see was a tablet and it wouldn't do the things I wanted. Wanted to download my old computer on to it but I couldn't figure out how to do that plus I found it very unfriendly for what I wanted. Returned it and got a regular computer.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was thinking.
customer_reviews.text: The all-in-one concept is a little misleading. The operating systems are challenging to put it nicely. Not sure if it is all that secure and there is not much info available for the software. I started using my old computer after a week or two.
customer_reviews.author: dlight18

customer_reviews.title: What a waste!
customer_reviews.text: right out of the box I thought the item was incredible. once I started loading applications the device started powering down. settings show 3.77 GB remaining. I have owned Android phones and tablets and never have I owned such a horrible device. in theory, the Slate should be a useful device but the fact that it powers down during simple use leads me to believe that the purchase was a waste of money. I will be returning item immediately. the device even powers down when attempting to master reset. if I could, this product would receive 0 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ron A.

customer_reviews.title: It's a large tablet
customer_reviews.text: It's very simple to set up, of course it is an All in One. It has the look and feel of my android phone and tablet. It really is just a large tablet.....which is confirmed constantly with messages like "you are using a mobile device or tablet". My intention was to buy an All in One PC and this is not it. The price was good but I need more than a tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: perfect for parents!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my parents for christmas. They have always been windows desktop people with internet browsing and word processing capabilities. Got the Slate and they couldn't be happier. Neither can I because I don't have to fix anything anymore since it runs on android.

customer_reviews.title: The HP Slate 21 with the Android OS works great! The only drawback is that some apps don't ...
customer_reviews.text: The HP Slate 21 with the Android OS works great! The only drawback is that some apps don't take into consideration the size of the device that your working on.
customer_reviews.author: Edward J Bohan Jr

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was completely happy with this purchase but having used it daily I find it most impractical to use. It is advertised as an all in one computer but tends to run slow, is not optimized for so many websites and isn't amazing to use I wouldn't suggest this as a buy for anyone other than maybe toddlers that need an oversized tablet

I am very unhappy with it and wish to return it. Is very limited, you cannod do much with it... i cannot even watch Amazon Instant Video movies cause basically imposible to download the app, so not even for Media works well. Sad.

product_meta.title: HP Slate 21-k100 Touchscreen All-in-One Desktop (Android 4.2 - upgradeable to 4.4)
product_meta.description:
The HP Slate 21-k100 All-in-One is the only Android all-in-one that gives you fast access to the most popular apps. Every time you log in, your favorite Android apps, documents, and widgets appear instantly. Everyone has the best seat in the house for watching videos, sharing slideshows, playing games and more with a 21.5" diagonal Full HD display and wide viewing angles. Angle the touchscreen to recline so you can comfortably type and swipe when you’re feeling laid-back—it only takes two fingers to pinch and zoom. This all-in-one also lets you connect to phones, tablets and other Wi-Fi-enabled devices directly with Wi-Fi Direct without even setting up a router, and share music, photos and files with any Bluetooth device. And when only a face-to-face conversation will do, the HP TrueVision HD Webcam keeps you looking your best, even in low light.



KEY SPECS




PRODUCT OVERVIEW


ANDROID JUST HIT THE BIG SCREEN
Let everyone in the house enjoy their favorite Google Play content on this big, Full HD touchscreen. Gather around and share your digital world. Now any room can become your digital command center with the HP Slate 21-k100 All-in-One.



THIS PRODUCT HAS


Use multi-touch gestures to work and play more naturally

Say goodbye to clutter with this sleek all-in-one PC

Watch videos with exceptional clarity

Enjoy great color, clear views and brilliant images from any angle

 

THE HP SLATE 21 EXPERIENCE


Android OS 4.2.2 Jelly Bean Use all your familiar Android apps and stay connected to your must-have digital content

Google Play Enjoy access to an ever-expanding world of music, apps, movies and more

 

DO MORE WITH GOOGLE


Google Search Quickly and easily find what you need

Google Voice Search Use your voice to do what you need

Gmail Get smarter e-mail wherever you are

Google+ Stay connected and share life as it happens

Google Maps Never get lost as you go to new places and old favorites

YouTube Millions of videos at your fingertips, available on the go

Google Play Books Read the books you love, everywhere you are

Google Play Music Play your music instantly



STORE, SYNC, SHARE


Free 25GB lifetime cloud storage plus sync from Box. Get your files from any internet-connected device. (Internet access required and not included. Click on the Box tile on the Start screen of your HP computer and register for a new account to receive the offer. Offer valid through December 31, 2014.)



IMAGE GALLERY




INCLUDED FEATURES


HP TrueVision HD Webcam Always come off looking your best, even in low light

Wireless Surf the web without cables; connect to wireless printers and other devices

Bluetooth Sync to mobile devices and print wirelessly

WiFi Direct Connect to phones, tablets and other Wi-Fi-enabled devices directly—without even setting up a router



SPECIFICATIONS


PROCESSOR
NVIDIA Tegra Quad-Core T40S 

OPERATING SYSTEM
Android 4.2.2, Jelly Bean with multi-user support

INTEGRATED DISPLAY
21.5” diagonal IPS widescreen Full HD LED-backlit 2-point touchscreen

MEMORY (RAM)
1GB DDR3-800 MHz SDRAM

STORAGE
8GB eMMC

WIRELESS
Wireless LAN 802.11a/b/g/n (dual-band) and Bluetooth 3.0

VIDEO GRAPHICS
72 GPU cores



COMPARE PRODUCTS

Tap, swipe and type on a super-responsive touchscreen

WINDOWS 8
Get more done and have more fun with the new fast and fluid Windows 8

ANDROID 4.2.2 JELLY BEAN

WIRELESS NETWORKING
Connect and share via an existing wireless network

BLUETOOTH CONNECTIVITY

FULL HD
